short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Recoil Mechanism and Pneumatic Recuperator for 120MM Cannon.
description: The delivery is requested at 7 Canadian Forces Supply Depot Edmonton on or before 01 January 2026. \\/nThe items must be new. No refurbished items will be accepted.\/nbasically its a contract \
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## TENDER TITLE
Recoil Cylinders and Recuperators

## Reference Number
cb-802-50751188

## Solicitation Number
W8486-249410/A

## Publication Date
2023-11-08

## Tender Closing Date
2024-01-02, 14:00:00

## Status
Expired

## Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide recoil cylinders and recuperators for the Canadian Armed Forces.

## Items Required
* 46 units of recoil mechanisms, NSN: 1015-12-410-9599, with a requirement for a new item, Part No.: 2500359-322500.000.0 or equivalent, NCAGE: D2396.
* 14 units of recuperators pneumatique, NSN: 1015-12-309-0279, with a requirement for a new item, Part No.: 2500194-322600.00.0 or equivalent, NCAGE: D2396.

## Delivery Location
Canadian Forces Supply Depot Edmonton

## Delivery Date
Prior to 01 January 2026

## Submission Language
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the Canadian Content policy will be applied.

## Contact Information
Danika Lavallee, Director, Land Procurement, DLP, (343) 596-7719, danika.lavallee@forces.gc.ca

## Attachments
[Download the RFx document in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24234/w8486-249410-a-adm-002-en.pdf), [Download the RFx document in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24234/w8486-249410-a-amd-002-fr.pdf), [Download the RFP Cover Page](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24234/w8486-249410-recoil-cylinders-recuperators---rfp-ddp-cover-page.pdf)

## UNSPSC Code
46111600 - Gun systems

## Classification
This procurement falls under the Defence category. The selection criteria is based on the Lowest Price. The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding. The region of opportunity is
